item.title: Nightbitch Review: Amy Adams Goes Absolutely Feral In Comedy About Motherhood & Identity
item.description: Nightbitch is very funny, a little gross, & an unforgettable role for Adams, eschewing the tone of the novel for something a little more digestible.

item.title: Nightbitch Ending Explained
item.description: Adapted from the Rachel Yoder novel of the same name, Nightbitch's metaphorical transformation leads to one mother's liberation.

item.title: Francis Ford Coppola Believes His $13.7M Sci-Fi Flop Will "Play For 40 Years" Despite Poor 35% RT Audience Score
item.description: Francis Ford Coppola believes his recent sci-fi flop will be better received in the future, since several of his movies got off to poor starts.
